enhanced_description: RECEX is a New Age Recruitment Exchange, operating as a 3-way marketplace designed to help companies find quality jobseekers by leveraging AI-based tools and an extensive Franchise Partner Network. Positioned as a reliable employment consultant and recruitment partner, RECEX draws on its team's prior experience in agency business through SMVA Consultants since 2013, having successfully served over 850 corporate clients. With 40 offices spread across India, RECEX is equipped to provide comprehensive recruitment resources nationwide. The platform's core objectives include boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity, creating more opportunities for job seekers and franchise partners, and achieving operational excellence to enhance productivity and network value for all stakeholders.
